name: Sydney. Half day trip N1
description: It half day trip, take 3-4 hours and suitable to people all ages. We start from  Town Hall near famous Queen Victoria Building and Central tower with observation desk. After this we walk down to Darling Harbour, will cross pedestrian bridge and follow the pass to Pyrmont where modern buildings and contemporary sculptures combined with tranquility of slow waters of Pyrmont Bay. Also, we finish our walk in one popular tourist attraction Fish Market where we will have lunch before return to the city.
